page.title: 03REPORT OF JACKMANS
page.content: Jackmans is a fairly large garden centre which sells lots of things, like flowers, plants, garden chairs,tables and fertilizer. The whole of Jackmans covers 3.6 acres. They also sell swimming pools and saunas. About 20,000 people a year goto to Jackmans. It costs over three hundred thousand pounds a year to run. There are 28 workers at Jackmans, 6 of these are part time and the rest are full time. At Jackmans, May is the busiest time of year. Most of the items that are bought from Jackmans are delivered during the week. Jackmans has now been open for 7 years, on the actual site, however it has been open there for 20 years. They sell over 200 types of plants and the prices vary from Â£1 to Â£15. There are also 49 deciduous trees.
